items.sentence: The most beautiful flowers have the sharpest thorns.
Tom first came to Japan when he was three years old.
We should make every effort to maintain world peace.
Why do you have your umbrella up? It\'s not raining.
Why don\'t you just go ahead and pay all your bills?
I\'ve made a lot of friends since I entered college.
If I were a rich man, I wouldn\'t have to work hard.
Why do I have to be the one who makes this decision?
Why is everyone acting like this is such a big deal?
Why is it always my responsibility to pay the bills?
